Edit: I just realized you can paste inside the blocks. I'm dumb. New question... how do I delete this post? LOL

Hi, I'm brand new to Quest but I'm familiar with programming. I've been struggling with this scenario: I wrote a bunch of code, but now I want to surround it with an "if" statement. I can't seem to click+drag or copy+paste my code inside the "if" statement. Is there really no way to do this other than recreating all the code again, but inside the "if" this time?

Thanks in advance, sorry if this is a repeat question (I can't find it anywhere).

Posts.EditableText: working with scripting using the Gui-Editor's script-manipulating/editing buttons is a bit clunky... the easiest method is to jsut code directly instead... if you know how to, that is, obviously/of-course.
